name: MoneyFalls - Coin Pusher Simulator
description:
MoneyFalls is a coin pusher simulator with accurate physics and stunning graphics with many added items and gadgets that makes the game more challenging.

MoneyFalls is a growing game that is been updated and will grow with many more addons and new machines, Also there is a VR version that needs just to be updated, Next RTX and other goodies, Updates will be Free as the game grows.

Many gadgets and mini games also other machines and challenges to discover yourself.(No images included)

Top 5 on the world

Added in version 1.2

4 More new machines.

1 New Coin Pusher with new challenges..
